page.title: 08SHOPPING AT ASDA
page.content: {ASDA,}owned by{Associated Dairies,}is the{largest shop}in the area. The shop began its life thirty six years ago as a{rope factory. 250 people}normally work there, rising to{350}over {Christmas. 28 men}and{38 women}work full time, 10 men and 167 women work part time. There are no {male}office staff though there are 4 male supervisors alongside 15 women.{60%}of the items in{Asda}are{food. ASDA}does not buy directly from{abroad,}but deals with{inporting companies. 78%}of the people who shop there do so {weekly, 6% monthly.}The{average spent} each time is{Â£19.70.} Surprisingly only{30%}of the people interviewed were{from our area.}The majority of the rest used the{free half hourly bus {service}from the{town centre. }
